subject: Create Platform Invariants Document
description:
Create the PLATFORM_INVARIANTS.md file at /home/ken/PLATFORM_INVARIANTS.md documenting the core architectural principles that will prevent drift. This includes:
1. Control Plane as source of truth
2. Idempotent destructive actions
3. Every request attributable to a project
4. Data plane never talks directly to control DB
5. Isolation enforcement rules
6. Universal observability
7. Fail closed security principle
8. Secrets never logged
9. MCP read-only by default
10. Soft delete first principle

Also create symlink in developer-portal directory.
